casebody.data:
No. —. Original.

Ex parte: In the Matter of David Lamar, Petitioner. Submitted February 21, 1916. Decided February 28, 1916. Mr. A. Leo Everett for the petitioner.

Motion for leave to file petition for writ of mandamus herein and that a rule to show cause issue denied. It is further ordered that a writ of certiorari issue to the United States Circuit Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit to bring up the record in the case of David Lamar, Plaintiff in Error, v. The United States.
